__e: So when you texted me, you didn't know it was me?
When you sent me that text, I told him it was from my mom.
I told him you sent the check in weeks ago, but some people don't like to listen,
But in the middle of our mission you directed me to go somewhere that had nothing to do with the mission.
Is it my fault if you sent your husband down here to talk to me this morning instead of coming yourself?
The end won't come that quick, not like it did for the men you sent for me.
The one you circulated, just before you...
I've not come for that. Then why? Didn't you ask me to come even if I don't get a reply?
Thanks to you. My grandfather remembers you here a few months ago... of course, when you sent the letter.
Yes, as you told me last night, when you texted me from atop your fiancee.
Well when you texted and said you will do anything ... {*corr to end} for a second chance, I though "why not"?
If you're such a big man, why did you send message of peace of forgetting past with your wife?
"As you didn't send a man in your place"
Well when you texted and said you will do anything ... {*corr to end} for a second chance, I though "why not"?
If you're such a big man, why did you send message of peace of forgetting past with your wife?
I sent them into the world, just as you sent me into the world.
Because you sent them out there on company orders maybe? Christ!
Why is there a photo of me in a letter that you sent to William's apartment?
I don't even remember the last time you sent us a Christmas card.
Oh, golly, I have every single one of your letters, and I always remember Christmas Eve you sent me a special something.
Hey, man, you never sent a face pic, so...
